text: "Great Balls of Fire" is a 1957 song by Jerry Lee Lewis and featured in the 1957 movie Jamboree. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in the United States, number 8 in New Zealand and number 30 in the Netherlands. It was also the title to the 1989 movie Great Balls of Fire! and played by Dennis Quaid. ==References== Category:1957 songs Category:Jerry Lee Lewis songs Category:Electric Light Orchestra songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs Category:Dolly Parton songs Category:Rockabilly songs
title: Great Balls of Fire
